name: Spin Up (itch)
description:
You have 120 seconds to reach the highest point. 

Controls:

- use right and left to spin

- release right or left to detach the stick from a circle

- you only have control of the stick when attached to a circle

- Press ENTER to start (as the  title screen does not precise... sorry about that)

- press R to restart

The music is pretty loud right now. So I suggest turning down the volume before running the game. 

======================

Game made with Godot Engine.

Art made with Aseprite

Music made by Tallbeard Studios: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Fonts made by John Watson: https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font

=====================

Game made for the ScoreSpace Jam #9[Sponsored by GAMEJAM CO.]
